body_html:
@peterjc123 It also fails even if I provide the -s option to gen.py:

python c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py -s c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 267, in <mod
ule>
    write(fname, GENERATOR_DERIVED.substitute(env))
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 113, in writ
e
    with open(filename, "w") as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'ATen/CPUGenerator.h'

Ah! Because there is no 'ATen' directory inside pytorch\torch\lib\build. If I manually create it, then gen.py works!

body:
@peterjc123 It also fails even if I provide the -s option to gen.py:

python c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py -s c:\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 267, in <mod
ule>
    write(fname, GENERATOR_DERIVED.substitute(env))
  File "c:\unix\compile\pytorch\pytorch\aten\src\ATen\gen.py", line 113, in writ
e
    with open(filename, "w") as f:
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'ATen/CPUGenerator.h'
```

Ah! Because there is no 'ATen' directory inside pytorch\torch\lib\build. If I manually create it, then gen.py works!
